snippet: The United States beat Italy, 9-6, moving on to the women’s water polo semifinals; the U.S. women’s volleyball team defeated Turkey; the Canadian women’s soccer coach criticized the U.S. team; badminton officials will examine the Olympic...
abstract: Olympic Roundup; United States women advance to the water polo semifinals; other Olympic events noted.
lead_paragraph: The United States beat Italy, 9-6, moving on to the women’s water polo semifinals; the U.S. women’s volleyball team defeated Turkey; the Canadian women’s soccer coach criticized the U.S. team; badminton officials will examine the Olympic format.
